TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LocalizedNameDescriptionPair extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an immutable (read-only) pair of "Name" and "Description" strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks LocalizedNameDescriptionPair is a basic building block for structures that express locale specific information for an <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>.
